alert.note: Alert for Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:06PM CDT until August 05 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR ROOKS COUNTY... At 905 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles north of Webster State Park to near Zurich to 7 miles southwest of Plainville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Automated Weather Station. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Plainville around 905 PM CDT. Stockton around 915 PM CDT. Codell around 920 PM CDT. Woodston around 930 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
